item.title: Aspose.PDF for Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.PDF for Java 24.1. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category PDFJAVA-37532 InterruptMonitor support for Java New Feature PDFJAVA-43506 Implement PDF to Markdown conversion New Feature PDFJAVA-40955 API is taking long time while subsetting the fonts Enhancement PDFJAVA-43232 PDF to JPG - Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.
